languages.text: Жестокие события, свидетелем которых стал Гордей Скатов на Футфоле, пошатнули его разум. Несомненный архитектурный гений оказался расколот полученной травмой, и лишь в паре собраний ценителей можно было отыскать его набросанный скачущим почерком труд "Совершенство Футфола как пустотной станции и кладбища".

The savage deeds that Gordei Skatov witnessed on Footfall traumatised him forever. His architectural genius was shattered. Only the rare collections of true connoisseurs held his work, written in a shaky hand, "Footfall: the Ultimate Void Station and Mortuary."
languages.original_text: Жестокие события, свидетелем которых стал Гордей Скатов на Футфоле, пошатнули его разум. Несомненный архитектурный гений оказался расколот полученной травмой, и лишь в паре собраний ценителей можно было отыскать его набросанный скачущим почерком труд "Совершенство Футфола как пустотной станции и кладбища".

traits.locale_text: Savage deeds that Gordei Skatov witnessed on Footfall damaged his mind. His apparent architectural genius became shattered by the trauma he received. Only in a couple of collections of true connoisseurs could one find his tome written in shaky cursive: Footfall as an Ultimate Void Station and Mortuary.

Savage deeds that Gordei Skatov witnessed on Footfall damaged his mind. His apparent architectural genius became shattered by the trauma he received. Only in a couple of collections of true connoisseurs could one find his tome written in shaky cursive: Footfall as an Ultimate Void Station and Mortuary.

The savage deeds that Gordei Skatov witnessed on Footfall traumatized him forever. His architectural genius was shattered. Only the rare collections of true connoisseurs held his work, written in a shaky hand, Footfall: the Ultimate Voidstation and Mortuary.

The savage deeds that Gordei Skatov witnessed on Footfall traumatised him forever. His architectural genius was shattered. Only the rare collections of true connoisseurs held his work, written in a shaky hand, "Footfall: the Ultimate Void Station and Mortuary."

The savage deeds that Gordei Skatov witnessed on Footfall traumatised him forever. His architectural genius was shattered. Only the rare collections of true connoisseurs held his work, written in a shaky hand, "Footfall: the Ultimate Void Station and Mortuary."

languages.text: 戈尔代·斯卡托夫在落脚港目睹的那些野蛮行为，在他心里留下了永远的创伤，建筑才华也被埋没了。到了最后，他以颤颤巍巍的手写下了他仅有的著作，只有极少数的收藏行家会收藏这部作品——《落脚港：登峰造极的虚空站与停尸间》
languages.original_text: The savage deeds that Gordei Skatov witnessed on Footfall traumatised him forever. His architectural genius was shattered. Only the rare collections of true connoisseurs held his work, written in a shaky hand, "Footfall: the Ultimate Void Station and Mortuary."

traits.locale_text: 戈尔代·斯卡托夫在落脚港目睹的那些野蛮行为，在他心里留下了永远的创伤，建筑才华也被埋没了。到了最后，他以颤颤巍巍的手写下了他仅有的著作，只有极少数的收藏行家会收藏这部作品——《落脚港：登峰造极的虚空站与停尸间》

languages.text: Die grauenhaften Taten, die Gordei Skatov auf Footfall miterleben musste, traumatisierten ihn für immer. Seine architektonische Genialität wurde zertrümmert. Nur in seltenen Sammlungen wahrer Liebhaber war sein Werk zu finden, mit zitternder Hand verfasst — "Footfall: Die ultimative Raumstation und Leichenhalle".
languages.original_text: The savage deeds that Gordei Skatov witnessed on Footfall traumatised him forever. His architectural genius was shattered. Only the rare collections of true connoisseurs held his work, written in a shaky hand, "Footfall: the Ultimate Void Station and Mortuary."

traits.locale_text: Die grauenhaften Taten, die Gordei Skatov auf Footfall miterleben musste, traumatisierten ihn für immer. Seine architektonische Genialität wurde zertrümmert. Nur in seltenen Sammlungen wahrer Liebhaber war sein Werk zu finden, mit zitternder Hand verfasst — "Footfall: Die ultimative Raumstation und Leichenhalle".

languages.text: Gordei Skatov fut irrémédiablement traumatisé par les atrocités dont il avait été témoin à Castel. Son génie pour l'architecture était brisé. Seuls quelques vrais connaisseurs possédaient son œuvre rédigée d'une main tremblante : « Castel : station et morgue suprême du vide ».
languages.original_text: The savage deeds that Gordei Skatov witnessed on Footfall traumatised him forever. His architectural genius was shattered. Only the rare collections of true connoisseurs held his work, written in a shaky hand, "Footfall: the Ultimate Void Station and Mortuary."

traits.locale_text: Gordei Skatov fut irrémédiablement traumatisé par les atrocités dont il avait été témoin à Castel. Son génie pour l'architecture était brisé. Seuls quelques vrais connaisseurs possédaient son œuvre rédigée d'une main tremblante : « Castel : station et morgue suprême du vide ».

languages.text: El salvajismo que Gordei Skatov presenció en Paso le traumatizó para el resto de su vida. Su genio arquitectónico quedó destrozado. Solo las colecciones más excepcionales de los verdaderos entendidos poseían su obra, escrita con mano temblorosa: «Paso: la estación morgue definitiva».
languages.original_text: The savage deeds that Gordei Skatov witnessed on Footfall traumatised him forever. His architectural genius was shattered. Only the rare collections of true connoisseurs held his work, written in a shaky hand, "Footfall: the Ultimate Void Station and Mortuary."

traits.locale_text: El salvajismo que Gordei Skatov presenció en Paso le traumatizó para el resto de su vida. Su genio arquitectónico quedó destrozado. Solo las colecciones más excepcionales de los verdaderos entendidos poseían su obra, escrita con mano temblorosa: «Paso: la estación morgue definitiva».

languages.text: フットフォールでゴーディ・スカトフが目撃した野蛮な行為は、彼に永遠のトラウマを植え付けた。彼の卓越した才能は打ち砕かれた。真の目利きたちの稀少なコレクションだけが、震える手で書かれた彼の作品『フットフォール：究極のヴォイドステーションと霊安室』を所蔵していた。
languages.original_text: The savage deeds that Gordei Skatov witnessed on Footfall traumatised him forever. His architectural genius was shattered. Only the rare collections of true connoisseurs held his work, written in a shaky hand, "Footfall: the Ultimate Void Station and Mortuary."

traits.locale_text: フットフォールでゴーディ・スカトフが目撃した野蛮な行為は、彼に永遠のトラウマを植え付けた。彼の卓越した才能は打ち砕かれた。真の目利きたちの稀少なコレクションだけが、震える手で書かれた彼の作品『フットフォール：究極のヴォイドステーションと霊安室』を所蔵していた。

languages.text: Gordei Skatov'un Binliman'da şahit olduğu vahşet, onu sonsuza dek travmaya uğrattı. Mimari dehası paramparça oldu. Titreyen bir elle yazılmış çalışması "Binliman: En Üst Düzey Bir Uçsuz İstasyonu ve Bir Morg", yalnızca gerçek eksperlerin nadir koleksiyonlarında yer aldı.
languages.original_text: The savage deeds that Gordei Skatov witnessed on Footfall traumatised him forever. His architectural genius was shattered. Only the rare collections of true connoisseurs held his work, written in a shaky hand, "Footfall: the Ultimate Void Station and Mortuary."
